law.text: At the request of a county attorney or other appropriate public official acting under KRS 403.870, a peace officer may take any lawful action reasonably necessary to locate a child or a party and assist a county attorney or other appropriate public official with responsibilities under KRS 403.870.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 133, sec. 37, effective July 13, 2004.
